meta.title: We create web services for millions to use
meta.description: We specialize in developing high load web applications, using JavaScript. And dream about space.

imgAlt.dog: a dog flying through the open space, on a spaceship called “MVP”, symbolizing our successfully launched projects
imgAlt.geometry: geometric figures showing the range of our services: a triangle with the text “MVP”, a circle with the text “Support the development of high load web applications” and a square with the text “Stack migration”
imgAlt.time: a woman on a bike with a jet pack, showing how quickly we do our job, with the text “We care about time-to-market metrics”
imgAlt.perfect: a man who neatly and meticulously cuts geometric bonsai, showing our desire to do everything perfectly, with the text “We born with a gene of perfectionism”
imgAlt.letter: a letter — hang-glider on which a man is flying

hire.title: We make the world more logical with JS
hire.subTitle: and dream about space
hire.paragraph1: We specialize in developing data-intensive web applications, including online banking systems, payment interfaces, sales and brokerage platforms, customer portals for airline companies, and websites for mobile network operators.
hire.paragraph2: However, our services are not just for large companies — we’re open to startups who are just at the beginning of their journey.
hire.author: Dmitriy Chekin, CEO

service.title: We create web services for millions to use
service.text: We’re engineers, and our true calling is to find the most elegant and economical solutions for business challenges. We use a variety of tools, technologies and programming languages, but more often than not, we use JavaScript.
service.app: Support and development of high load web applications

openSource.title: Open source technologies only
openSource.text: We are the part of the global community of developers who use popular open source technologies and frameworks, such as React, Angular, Vue, Node and many others.

time.title: We care about time to market metrics
time.text: Our methodology is similar to Scrum and involves working with sprints. Our sprints generally last one or two weeks. At the end of each sprint, we release a new build version and plan product features that will be developed in the next sprint.

partners.title: More than 450 completed projects in different industries

perfect.title: We were born with a gene of perfectionism
perfect.text: Most of us are perfectionists. Perfectionism is far more dangerous than procrastination — and we have tamed it. That is why our code is architecturally complex yet elegant, and our attention to detail is almost maniacal — but only if justified by the business requirements. In our opinion, it is focus on details that makes the difference between average and successful projects.

form.title: Talk to us
form.messagePlaceholder: How can we be of help to you?
form.messageLabel: How can we be of help to you?
